name: International Zinc Association
goal:
IZA is an association representing leading mining companies, zinc smelters and semi-fabricators.
IZA activities in Europe are restricted to environmental, health and safety aspects related to mining, refining, processing and use of zinc and some compounds.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:

REACH, CLP, Cosmetics Regulation, Food Contact Material and implementation of 'nano' notion in all EU regulations.
